text: When setting up "Custom behavioral events", where do the properties show up? I see the list of "property names" when I click in to the event
but not sure if I have it setup properly

Once you start sending event data with those property values filled in, you'll be able to report on their completion in Reports.

They'll also be more heavily available in Workflows, available as triggers and segmentation options. That's dependent on some other Workflows work that's happening, so you may or may not see them available in the 'Delay until event' option.

Takes little bit of time for event data to show up in Reporting
In a Workflow or in a Report
<@UJJ239SC9> thanks for the info. That all makes sense now
